deployment.attachable: This unit can be attached to another friendly unit at deployment.
deployment.teleportation: This model's unit can perform the "Setup teleportation" action.

model.stealth: If this model's unit is near cover, it can only be selected as a target unit by units within 20 cm.
model.large_profile: This model cannot perform the "Brace" action.
model.fly: This model can perform the "Fly" action up to the given distance.
model.move: This model can perform the "Move" action up to the given distance.
model.score: This model's unit can perform the "Score objective" action.

weapons.ap: If the target model's armor characteristic is no more than 2 higher than this weapon's strength: The minimum damage infliced by each hit is 1.
weapons.heavy: Can only use this weapon when performing the "Heavy attack" action.
weapons.precise: Can select attached units as target unit.
weapons.separate: When attacking with another weapon without "separate": Can also attack with this weapon during the attack action.
